@metadata.name: os
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, it is "implied", and can be fully identified by the library prefix. This is nearly always named as "os", so it is pretty safe to assume it can be used as prefix.

os 001.description: The approximate amount of CPU time in seconds used by the program, as an integer.

os 002.description: The time according to the format string, as a string or table.

os 003.description: The difference in CPU time, as an integer.

os 004.description: The time in seconds according to current cpu time, as an integer.
